title: Should I Sell My Car To Pay Off Debt? (Hour 2)
description:
George Kamel & Dr. John Delony discuss:

Selling a car to pay off debt,

Getting inspired to get focused with money,

Tithing on a home sale,

Getting out of $135k of debt.


Support Our Sponsor:

DreamCloud
